job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for an experienced technical support engineer who is comfortable working in a complex and dynamic environment and who can help contribute to the growth of our global support function as we continue to scale up our operations. As a Technical Support Engineer, you will help our EMEA and global customers solve their wide range of technical issues with Dataiku, such as installation, security, and integration with other big data technologies. You will also collaborate with various internal teams to solve and escalate customer issues as needed.

   Some expected outcomes for this role
     * Help EMEA and global customers solve their technical issues with Dataiku through a variety of communication channels
     * Communicate with our R&D team to solve complex issues and/or share feedback from our EMEA customers for future product improvement
     * Work with other customer-facing teams when escalating or rerouting issues to help ensure a proper and efficient / timely resolution
     * Document knowledge in the form of technical articles and contribute to knowledge bases or forums within specific areas of expertise
     * Occasionally wear multiple hats and help out with other activities in a fast-paced and dynamic startup team environment
job_details.full_text:
Technical Support Engineer

We are looking for an experienced technical support engineer who is comfortable working in a complex and dynamic environment and who can help contribute to the growth of our global support function as we continue to scale up our operations. As a Technical Support Engineer, you will help our EMEA and global customers solve their wide range of technical issues with Dataiku, such as installation, security, and integration with other big data technologies. You will also collaborate with various internal teams to solve and escalate customer issues as needed.

   Some expected outcomes for this role
     * Help EMEA and global customers solve their technical issues with Dataiku through a variety of communication channels
     * Communicate with our R&D team to solve complex issues and/or share feedback from our EMEA customers for future product improvement
     * Work with other customer-facing teams when escalating or rerouting issues to help ensure a proper and efficient / timely resolution
     * Document knowledge in the form of technical articles and contribute to knowledge bases or forums within specific areas of expertise
     * Occasionally wear multiple hats and help out with other activities in a fast-paced and dynamic startup team environment

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on technical support for a specific software (Dataiku) and does not involve the core responsibilities of developing, training, or deploying AI/ML models. The tasks described are primarily customer-facing technical assistance, issue resolution, and knowledge documentation, which fall outside the scope of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles. The role is more aligned with traditional technical support or customer success engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding customer issues with Dataiku and collaborating with internal teams to ensure efficient resolution, implying a need to understand the business context of customer problems and product usage.
job_tasks.phrase: help contribute to the growth of our global support function as we continue to scale up our operations

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding customer needs and technical challenges related to Dataiku.
job_tasks.phrase: help our EMEA and global customers solve their wide range of technical issues with Dataiku

job_tasks.justification: While not developing new software, the role involves understanding and troubleshooting technical issues related to software installation, security, and integration, which requires a technical understanding of software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: installation, security, and integration with other big data technologies

job_tasks.justification: The role requires collaborating with internal teams to resolve customer issues, indicating a need to understand internal processes and stakeholder needs.
job_tasks.phrase: collaborate with various internal teams to solve and escalate customer issues as needed

job_tasks.justification: The role involves direct customer interaction to resolve technical problems, requiring an understanding of customer needs and product functionality.
job_tasks.phrase: Help EMEA and global customers solve their technical issues with Dataiku through a variety of communication channels

job_tasks.justification: The role requires communication with R&D to resolve issues and provide customer feedback, indicating an understanding of product development cycles and customer impact.
job_tasks.phrase: Communicate with our R&D team to solve complex issues and/or share feedback from our EMEA customers for future product improvement

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working with other customer-facing teams to ensure efficient issue resolution, requiring an understanding of cross-functional collaboration and customer satisfaction.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with other customer-facing teams when escalating or rerouting issues to help ensure a proper and efficient / timely resolution

job_tasks.justification: The role involves creating technical documentation and contributing to knowledge bases, which requires understanding how to articulate technical information clearly for users and internal teams.
job_tasks.phrase: Document knowledge in the form of technical articles and contribute to knowledge bases or forums within specific areas of expertise

job_tasks.justification: The role requires flexibility and the ability to contribute to various activities in a startup environment, implying a broad understanding of business operations and team needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Occasionally wear multiple hats and help out with other activities in a fast-paced and dynamic startup team environment
